meta.article_title: September 19, 2016 - Five Serves That EVERYONE Should Master

debutant.description: A serve that breaks away from the receiver's timing and often leaves them lunging for the ball.
A serve that draws receivers out of position for the next shot.

intermediaire.description: A serve that breaks away from the receiver and often leaves them lunging for the ball.

avance.nom: Backhand-type sidespin from the middle, served short to forehand or long to backhand
avance.description: A serve that breaks away from the receiver and can be awkward to receive.

avance.nom: Sidespin-topspin serve that looks like backspin
avance.description: A serve that pops up or goes off the end if pushed.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Fast no-spin at the elbow drill
exercices_complementaires.description: A drill that throws off a receiver's timing and often leaves them lunging for the ball.
A drill that draws receivers out of position for the next shot.
